name: Cauli Kebabs

ingredients.name: Fajita Seasoning or Shish Kebab Seasoning

preparation:
1. Preheat grill to medium high.
  2. Chop cauliflower into small pieces. Place in Multipurpose Steamer; cover and microwave on high for 2 min.
  3. Uncover; drizzle with 2 tbsp oil and seasoning. Stir to coat.
  4. Thread onto 12" metal skewers. Grill for 6â€“8 min, or until lightly charred.
  5. Meanwhile, in bowl, stir together dry glaze, jelly, soy sauce, and 1 tbsp oil.
  6. Place skewers onto a large platter; drizzle with sauce and sprinkle with toppings, if desired.
tips: Let cauliflower marinate for 15 min before grilling to absorb flavours.
